content.raw: It worries me a bit to bump a dependency in a minor/patch release, since it will at first break all builds downstream, but it looks like it's a [common practice](http://semver.org/#what-should-i-do-if-i-update-my-own-dependencies-without-changing-the-public-api). One thing we could do to alleviate this is to support both versions 2 and 3, but I'm ok with it the way it is.
